code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
  input logic clk,
  input logic j,
  input logic k,
  input logic reset, // Added synchronous reset
  output logic Q
);

  always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
      Q <= 1'b0; // Reset state
    end else begin
      case ({j, k})
        2'b00: Q <= Q;    // Retain old state
        2'b01: Q <= 1'b0; // Reset
        2'b10: Q <= 1'b1; // Set
        2'b11: Q <= ~Q;   // Toggle
        default: Q <= Q;  // Default case for synthesis tools
      endcase
    end
  end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

iterations.code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
  input logic clk,
  input logic j,
  input logic k,
  output logic Q
);

  always @(*) begin
    case ({j, k})
      2'b00: Q = Q;    // Retain old state
      2'b01: Q = 1'b0; // Reset
      2'b10: Q = 1'b1; // Set
      2'b11: Q = ~Q;   // Toggle
      default: Q = Q;  // Default case for synthesis tools
    endcase
  end

  always @(posedge clk) begin
    Q <= Q; // Update Q on the positive edge of clk
  end

endmodule
```
